Verses: 1 amadhsiyaa Irubaththaindhaam Vayadhile Raajaavaagi, Irubaththonbadhu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Erusalem Nagaraththaalaagiya Avanudaiya Thaayinper Yovadhaanaal.
2 avan Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan; Aanaalum Muzhumanadhode Appadi Seyyavillai.
3 raajyabaaram Avanukku Sthirappattapodhu, Avan Than Thagappanaagiya Raajaavaik Kolaiseydha Thannudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaik Kondrupottaan.

4 aanaalum Pillaigalinimiththam Pidhaakkalum, Pidhaakkalinimiththam Pillaigalum Kolaiseyyappadaamal, Avanavan Seydha Paavaththinimiththam Avanavan Kolaiseyyappadavendumendru Moseyin Nyaayappramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Karththar Kattalaiyittapragaaram, Avargaludaiya Pillaigalai Avan Kollaadhirundhaan.

5 amadhsiyaa Yoodhaa Manusharaik Koodivara Seydhu, Avargal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsangalinpadiye, Yoodhaa Benyameen Dhesangal Engum Aayiramperukku Adhipadhigalaiyum Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalaiyum Vaiththu, Irubadhu Vayadhumudharkondu Adharku Merpattavargalai Lakkampaarththu, Yuththaththirkup Purappadavum, Eettiyaiyum Kedagaththaiyum Pidikkavunthakka Yuththaveerar Moondrulatchamperendru Kandaan.
6 isravelilum Latcham Paraakkiramasaaligalai Nooruthaalandhu Velli Koduththuk Koolikku Amarththinaan.
7 dhevanudaiya Manushan Oruvan Avanidaththil Vandhu: Raajaave, Isravelin Senai Ummudane Varalaagaadhu; Karththar Eppiraayeemin Sagala Puththiraraagiya Isravelodum Irukkavillai.

8 poga Manadhaanaal Neer Pom, Kaariyaththai Nadaththum; Yuththaththirkuth Thidankondu Nillum; Dhevan Ummai Saththuruvukku Munbaaga Vizhappannuvaar; Oththaasai Seyyavum Vizhappannavum Dhevanaale Koodum Endraan.

9 appozhudhu Amadhsiyaa: Appadiyaanaal Naan Isravelin Senaikkuk Koduththa Nooruthaalandhirkaaga Seyyavendiyadhu Enna Endru Dhevanudaiya Manushanaik Kettaan. Adharku Dhevanudaiya Manushan: Adhaippaarkkilum Adhigamaaik Karththar Umakkuk Kodukkakkoodum Endraan.

10 appozhudhu Amadhsiyaa Eppiraayeemaril Thannidaththukku Vandha Senaiyaith Thangal Veettirkup Poividap Piriththuvittaan; Adhinaal Avargalukku Yoodhaavinmel Migundha Kobamoondu, Ukkiramaana Erichchalode Thangalidaththirkuth Thirumbipponaargal.
11 amadhsiyaavo Thidankondu, Than Janaththaik Kootti, Uppup Pallaththaakkukkup Poi, Seyeer Puththiraril Padhinaayiramperai Vettinaan.
12 yoodhaa Puththirar, Padhinaayiramperai Uyirodu Pidiththu, Oru Kanmalaiyuchchiyile Kondupoi, Avargalellaarum Norungippogaththakkadhaai Andhak Kanmalaiyuchchiyilirundhu Keezhe Thallivittaargal.

13 thannodukooda Yuththaththirku Varaadhapadikku, Amadhsiyaa Thiruppivitta Yuththapurushar, Samaariyaa Thuvakkip Peththoronmattumulla Yoodhaa Pattanangalinmel Vizhundhu, Avaigalil Moovaayiramperai Vetti, Thiralaaik Kollaiyittaargal.

14 amadhsiyaa Edhomiyarai Muriya Adiththu, Seyeer Puththirarin Dheyvangalaik Konduvandhapinbu, Avan Avaigalaith Thanakku Dheyvangalaaga Vaiththu, Avaigalukku Munbaagap Panindhu Avaigalukkuth Thoobankaattinaan.

15 appozhudhu, Karththar Amadhsiyaavinmel Kobamoondavaraagi, Avanidaththukku Oru Theerkkadharisiyai Anuppinaar; Ivan Avanai Nokki: Thangal Janaththai Umadhu Kaikkuth Thappuvikkaadhepona Janaththin Dheyvangalai Neer Naaduvaanen Endraan.

16 thannode Avan Ippadip Pesinapodhu, Raajaa Avanai Nokki: Unnai Raajaavukku Aalosanaikkaaranaaga Vaiththaargalo? Adhai Vittuvidu; Nee En Vettappadavendum Endraan; Appozhudhu Andhath Theerkkadharisi Adhaivittuvittu: Neer Ippadi Seydhu, En Aalosanaiyaik Kelaamarponapadiyinaal, Dhevan Ummai Azhikka Yosanaiyaayirukkiraar Enbadhai Ariven Endraan.

17 pinbu Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Amadhsiyaa Yosanaipanni, Yegoovin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaagaasin Puththiran Yovaas Ennum Isravelin Raajaavukku: Nammudaiya Saamarththiyaththaip Paarppomvaa Endru Solliyanuppinaan.

18 adharku Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yovaas Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Amadhsiyaavukku Aal Anuppi: Leebanonilulla Mutchediyaanadhu Leebanonilulla Kedhurumaraththai Nokki: Nee Un Magalai En Maganukku Manaiviyaaga Vivaagancheydhu Kodu Endru Ketkachchollitru; Aanaalum Leebanonilulla Orukaattumirugam Andha Vazhi Pogaiyil Odi Andha Mutchediyai Midhiththuppottadhu.

19 nee Edhomiyarai Adiththaai Endru Perumaipaaraatta Un Irudhayam Unnaik Garvankollappanninadhu; Ippodhum Nee Un Veettile Iru; Neeyum Unnode Yoodhaavumkooda Vizhumpadikku, Pollaappaith Thedikkolvaanen Endru Sollachchonnaan.
20 aanaalum Amadhsiyaa Sevikodaadheponaan; Avargal Edhomin Dheyvangalai Naadinadhinimiththam Avargalai Avargal Saththurukkal Kaiyil Oppukkodukkumpadikku Dhevanaale Ippadi Nadandhadhu.
21 appadiye Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yovaas Vandhaan; Yoodhaavilirukkira Pedhshimesile Avanum, Amadhsiyaa Ennum Yoodhaavin Raajaavum Thangal Saamarththiyaththaip Paarththaargal.
22 yoodhaa Isravelukku Munbaaga Murindhu, Avaravar Thangal Koodaarangalukku Odipponaargal.

23 isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yovaas Agasiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaasukkup Pirandha Amadhsiyaa Ennum Yoodhaavin Raajaavaip Pedhshimesile Pidiththu, Avanai Erusalemukkukkonduvandhu, Erusalemin Alangaththile Eppiraayeem Vaasalthodangi Moolaivaasalmattum Naanoorumuzha Neelam Idiththuppottu,

24 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththil Obedh Edhomin Vasaththile Agappatta Sagala Ponnaiyum, Velliyaiyum, Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Raajaavin Aramanaippokkishangalaiyum, Kiriyiruppavargalaiyum, Pidiththukkondu Samaariyaavukkuth Thirumbipponaan.
25 yovaagaasin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaas Ennum Isravelin Raajaa Maranamadaindhapinbu, Yovaasin Kumaaranaagiya Amadhsiyaa Ennum Yoodhaavin Raajaa Padhinaindhu Varusham Uyirodirundhaan.
26 amadhsiyaavin Aadhiyodandha Nadapadiyaana Matra Varththamaanangal Yoodhaa Isravel Raajaakkalin Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.

27 amadhsiyaa Karththarai Vittup Pinvaangina Kaalamudharkondu Erusalemilirundhavargal Avanukku Virodhamaagak Kattuppaadupannikkondaargal; Adhinimiththam Avan Laageesukku Odipponaan; Aanaalum Avan Pirage Laageesukku Manusharai Anuppinaargal; Avargal Ange Avanaik Kondrupottu,
28 kudhiraigalmel Avanai Eduththuvandhu, Yoodhaavin Nagaraththil Avan Pidhaakkalandaiyile Adakkampanninaargal.
